outputs.output_descr: The project is implemented jointly with the UN Police. It will (1) contribute to the development of  the National Police  management and administration capacity; (2) enhance its capacity through targeted training; (3) strengthen its internal oversight mechanisms and (4) support the Secretariat of State for Security in finalizing the promotions regime.

The project is implemented jointly with the UN Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste. It includes: 1) undertaking a public perceptions survey of the security sector; 2) completing a strategic review of the security sector; 3) providing technical assistance to bridge capacity gaps; and 4) Implementing priority capacity development initiatives.

The project is implemented jointly with the UN Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste. It will promote the four dimensions of security sector reform, namely, civilian oversight, operational management, financial accountability and policy research capacity to ensure peace and stability in Timor-Leste.

The project is implemented jointly with the UN Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste. The project will contribute to: (1) enhancing civilian oversight and management capacity in priority areas identified by national partners, and (2) improving research and training capacity in the security sector. It will provide technical assistance for policy oversight, legal and institutional development and capacity building in the Parliament, the Secretariats of State for Defence and Security; and the Office of the President.

The project is implemented jointly with the UN Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste. It will promote the four dimensions of security sector reform, namely, civilian oversight, operational management, financial accountability and policy research capacity to ensure peace and stability in Timor-Leste.

The project is implemented jointly with the UN Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste. The project will contribute to: (1) enhancing civilian oversight and management capacity in priority areas identified by national partners, and (2) improving research and training capacity in the security sector. It will provide technical assistance for policy oversight, legal and institutional development and capacity building in the Parliament, the Secretariats of State for Defence and Security; and the Office of the President.

project_descr:
Improved institutional and human resources capacity (system and
skills) to provide access to justice, uphold the rule of law and protect
human rights.
